name: Shazam Core
description: Identify any song. Discover, artists, lyrics, videos & playlists to create a song detector site/application

api_methods.name: songs/recognize-song
api_methods.description: Enough 3-5 seconds of audio, no more than 3 mb. Optimally 500 kb. It is best practice to send in chunks until you find a match. Get details of recognizing track by file. Ex. https://disk.yandex.ru/d/0jCEoQP3hkPDzg https://disk.yandex.ru/d/sepd6XUnhls1aw

parameters.name: audio
parameters.description: Audio file. Enough 2-4 seconds of audio, no more than 1 mb. Optimally 500 kb. Only .wav .ogg .mp3 files allowed. Ex. https://disk.yandex.ru/d/0jCEoQP3hkPDzg

utterances.utterance: Can you identify the song from this audio clip I recorded at the concert? It's in .mp3 format.
I have a short .wav file of a song. Could you tell me what song it is?
Here's a .ogg file of a tune I heard on the radio. Can you recognize it?
I found this .mp3 file on my phone. Can you help me identify the song?
This .wav audio clip is from a movie soundtrack. Can you tell me which song it is?
I have a .ogg file of a song snippet. Can you find out the song's name?
Can you identify this song from the .mp3 file I just uploaded?
I recorded this .wav file at a live event. Can you recognize the song?
Here's a .ogg audio clip from a song I like. Can you tell me what it is?
I have this .mp3 file of a song. Can you help me figure out the title?
